## User Story
As a **[role]**
I want **[goal]**
So that **[benefit]**

## Gherkin Scenarios

### Scenario: [Scenario Name]
```gherkin
Given [context]
When [action]
Then [outcome]
```

### Scenario: [Another Scenario]
```gherkin
Given [context]
And [additional context]
When [action]
Then [outcome]
And [additional outcome]
```
